briefdescription.para: Adds the PHY timing information to the BCH payload for the given fapi_pdu.

simplesect.para: A packed BCH payload with the timing information, as per TS38.212 Section 7.1.1.

memberdef.argsstring: (const dl_ssb_pdu &fapi_pdu, uint32_t sfn, bool hrf, subcarrier_spacing scs_common)
memberdef.name: generate_bch_payload

briefdescription.para: Encodes the full BCH payload for the given fapi_pdu.

simplesect.para: A packed BCH payload, as per TS38.212 Section 7.1.1.

memberdef.argsstring: (span< uint8_t > dest, const dl_ssb_pdu &fapi_pdu, uint16_t sfn, bool hrf, subcarrier_spacing scs_common)
memberdef.name: fill_bch_payload

briefdescription.para: Fills the contents of the BCH payload.

detaileddescription.para: The BCH packing procedure is selected based on the field bch_payload_type of fapi_pdu, as per TS38.212 Section 7.1.1 and references therein.

briefdescription.para: Returns the coefficient $\beta_{PSS}$ from the given SSB PDU (see TS38.213, Section 4.1).
